price: “Idem onamo gdje mi je Gospodar moj naredio”, reče, “On će me kuda treba uputiti."
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
